entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
